### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ThirdPartyApplications (
    id UUID NOT NULL,
    app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    connection_string TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_interval INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);


CREATE TABLE CRMData (
    entry_id UUID NOT NULL,
    data_category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_sync TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (entry_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE id = '1a1105b0-833e-4ac5-b476-98ec3aae88ac';

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM CRMData WHERE data_category = 'Contacts' AND last_sync < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE ThirdPartyApplications (
    id UUID NOT NULL,
    app_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    connection_string TEXT NOT NULL,
    sync_interval INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (id)
);


CREATE TABLE CRMData (
    entry_id UUID NOT NULL,
    data_category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    last_sync TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (entry_id)
);

### STATEMENT

DELETE FROM ThirdPartyApplications WHERE sync_interval > INTERVAL '1 day';
